description:
Trapped in a dark future created by Variable Cord`s selfish actions, Tasuku must find a way to heal Jack and time-travel home. Meanwhile, Sophia finds herself captured by the future version of Gratos. Can Tasuku find hope and save the future?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kibou no Hoshi! Chou Hikari Hoshi Mamoru Jackknife "Aster"!!
Star of Hope! Radiant Guardian, Jackknife "Aster"!!
希望の星! 超光星護ジャックナイフ "アステール"!!
